column5: Key informationThis unique apprenticeship programme aims to prepare you with the knowledge and values you need for a technical career as a data scientist. During your course you’ll gain leadership skills to enable you to manage complex data science projects to help progress your career.Course overviewThis unique apprenticeship programme aims to prepare you with the knowledge and values you need for a technical career as a data scientist. During your course you’ll gain leadership skills to enable you to manage complex data science projects to help progress your career.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
